short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A extension to simulate the combat in CryptoBlades

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you need a percentage of your combats in Cryptoblades, this extension is for you! With it, you can simulate a combat and get de percentage of each, just hover your mouse in sword and see the magic happen.
